content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were enjoying the evening sky.  from the north travelling in an easterly direction came a star like object, no sound, no flashing lights.  we had enough time to go in and get our kids to see it. the moment my oldest, who's battling luekemia, stepped out onto the porch, this light, which was already brighter that the light of jupiter, flared brighter, and continued its course til we lost visual sight under the horizon trees.  my wife, whose vision seems to be better than mine, thought she could make out a triangular shape.  

****we saw the same light, coming from the same direction oct. 7th, at approximatley 645 pm.  very strange.
content.summary: Same as the oct5th 2008 sighting, except didn't shrink to red dot

content.detailedDescription: Seemed like landing light of a plane entering landing pattern, seemed low and slow i noticed no blinking nav. lights i grabbed my binoculars and followed the object as it made a turn to the south and decreased in size and turner amber till it just dissapered.
content.summary: Look like a landing light from west seemed low as if it was entering landing pattern

content.detailedDescription: Formation of 4 starlike objects flying north to south no. 2 light in the line abrest moved in and out formation many times this is happening so often i think someone should investagate this area.
content.summary: Formation of 4 starlike objects flying from north to south

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were on our way home from a photography workshop in jackson, and stopped at the city of rocks national reserve in idaho for the night to camp and shoot some night photos.  after a while of shooting, my friend told me to come to where he was and pointed out what looked like a star that was changing colors from a pinkish color to green to white, blue and yellow.  we both thought the color changing was strange, but he told me to keep watching.  

a moment later, the color changing light moved very erratically up and to the right.  the movement was similar to what a sheet of paper would do if you dropped it, only moving upwards instead of down.  we both watched it for a while, trying to figure out what it was.  we thought it might be an airplane or helicopter, but the movement was not like any type of aircraft that i know of.  the colors were also not that of aircraft that i know of.  sometimes the movement was kind of slow, others it moved a great distance very quickly.

we watched it for a while, and after a while we both had to get some sleep, and went to bed.  we both thought about reporting it, but figured nobody would believe us, and think that since we are photographers that we were trying to pull off some sort of hoax.  we were both very confused just trying to figure out what it could be.

it wasn't until i talked to my brother about it that i decided to report it.  he told me it sounded similar to the lights sighted over stephenville, texas, recently.  i looked for photos of this event online, and found something that was very similar to what i had shot, and decided that i should report the incident.

the first photo is shot with a 300mm lens fully zoomed in for 5 seconds.  the second photo is just a cropped image to enlarge detail.  no editing was done to either photo, except for cropping of the second image.
content.summary: Color changing light moving erratically just off the horizon way off in the distance.

content.detailedDescription: I saw this object before a few weeks ago. from my house, it comes from the boulder co. area, at about 7,000 to 10,000 feet abouve sea level and travels toward bukley air base in a strait line or flight path. after it travels over head, the first time it disapeared after about a mile, the second time it continued to be bright until i lost sight of it behind some trees. as it traveled directly over head i looked at it through my binoculars and did not see a plane shadow just the bright light. i live near dia and see planes all of the time. this thing is strange. i thought that it could be some secret aircraft sinse it seems to go toward buckley. but it would be extreemly advanced if that is the case. it makes no noise or sound at all. when watching air planes i am able to hear them at 20,000 feet. i believe that i will see this thing again. it apeared at about the same time on both ocations. i actually think i saw it a couple of months ago but that time i thought it was a plane and stoped watching it before it got close.
content.summary: Bright light like jupiter, same size ,no plane shape, just light

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i stepped outside my house in bonny doon, ca in order to go to an outbuilding.  directly in our line of view as we stepped down the stairs, we noticed a big bright white light moving in a straight line across the sky.  i thought it must be an airplane at first.  we watched it as it went over head.  it moved about the same speed as an airplane.  however, it was brighter than a normal airplane and consisted only of a single light - no flashing.  there was also no noise.  it also occurred to us that it might be a satellite, but it seemed much lower and larger than that.   

as it moved further towards the southern end of the sky, it began to turn bright red.  as it turned red, it also got smaller and smaller.  the intensity of the light also seemed to dim as though it was fizzling out or moving very far away very fast.  this happened for no more than 5 seconds before it disappeared completely.    

neither my girlfriend nor i felt many emotions during the event, other than fascination and a little disbelief.  we stopped in our tracks and just watched it.  we asked each other, "is it turning red?" and "wow, did it just disappear?" - stuff like that.  we both saw the same thing.

about a minute or two after it had disappeared, a loud airplane flew across the sky headed in about the same direction.  it was somewhat low in the sky and didn't seem to be a regular passenger jet.  not really an expert on planes but it looked weird - 4 red lights in a row in the back with one long white light along the hull.
content.summary: Bright constant light moved across sky, headed south, suddenly turned red and then quickly decreased in size and brightness until it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to take a smoke break. observed what i thought was an airplane flying towards my house. i asked my spouse if we lived near an airport. she said no. i told her to come see this airplane flying towards the house. she sat on the couch watching tv and wouldn't come, so i told her that if it wasn't an airplane then it must be a ufo. she got up to come and see what i was talking about. the objects just sat there in the sky. then the objects separated and one shot off heading north and then disappeared. she told me to grab the camara, and when i went for the camara and made it back, the other object sat there for a while and then just disappeared. the picture i am submitting isn't good, because by the time i got the camara ready, the object was disappearing. it is not the bright light, but to the left of the street light is the object as it was disappearing.
content.summary: 2 ufos hovered above neighborhood

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: On the way home from work i noticed a black spot comming over south mountain heading east while we were driving west on ray rd just on the east side of interstate 10. at first i thought it was a helecopter but realized that it had no rotor blade on the top. it was fairly low in the sky and slowly ascending. after watching it for about 10 seconds or so i told my fience to find somewhere to pull over the car so i could get out and take a better look. we pulled over in the mervyn's parking lot on the north side of ray rd. i thought maybe it was a really large bunch of red baloons as the object started to shine bright red and looked to be rotating vertically and it seemed to be lumpy like a bunch of baloons. when we got out of the car and took a closer look at it it seamed instead of reflecting matalic red like a foil baloon to be shining red lights the same red as stop light or brake lights on a car. then i noticed another identical object moving in a s/w direction looking like it had just flown over scottsdale/tempe. after that i noticed 2 more objects moving in a south direction looking like they had just flown over sky harbor airport. by this time the first one had begun rapidly ascendingand it seemed that the 5 objects were lined up diagonally the first the higher up and the second to last lowest. the last one seemed to speed up and fligh above the second to last. then we saw another identical object moving west from over the south end of mesa. the last object curved to head s/w and pulled in between the 2nd and 3rd object. all 6 of the objects continued to ascend untill we could no longer see them. it all took about 10 minutes. we didn't move after pulling into the mervyn's parking lot and after we could no longer see them we continued on to pick up our son from daycare. i noticed after picking my son up at daycare and we started heading to the taco bell on the n/w corner of chandler blvd and mountain pky. that there were no planes in the air. i watched the sky the whole way through the drive through and back to our apartment and saw only one plane and it was a private plane heading to chandler air park. i did not see another plane in the sky untill about 6:10 pm. my fience said while we were looking at the objects he noticed a comercial aircraft bank away from the objects but i didn't see it myself.
content.summary: 6 objects in total, the first heading over south mountain in a s/e direction, 4 in a slightly s/w direction, and 1 in a more sharp s/w direction.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a clear cool night, we went to the lake erie shore at osborne park to get away from the city lights to view the stars. we noticed blinking lights to the north about 30 degrees above the horizon. the lights were varying in color and stationary for the 10 minute duration we were there. the kids were cold so we left after about 10 minutes. it apperaed to be at a distance of 10 miles or so.

witnessed by myself, my lady friend maria and my son 8 and daughter 9.
content.summary: Colored blinking stationary lights

content.detailedDescription:
This report comes in sections over about a 45 minute time period. the objects would appear and disapear throughout this time . skies were clear and it was very nice out. midway planes flying low coming in for landings to airport from my point of view west from backyard patio.

i was outside on patio talking on the phone for several minutes. i looked towards the west and saw an airplane flying low. in front of the airplane was a large, shiny oval object standing up in front of it, it looked almost like a sheild. as the airplane neared the object it disappeared right in front of it. after the plane went by the shiny oval reappered. this object was due west.  this object hovered in the general same spot appearing and disappearing for about 5 minutes. 

about 5 minutes later, i saw this same object now more northwest just were the planes turn. the object did the same as above.

several minutes later, i saw this same object as described above now in the southwest cornor and had gained a slightly higher altitude. yet still low. the planes were flying underneath it now.

this object was a shiny silver to a pure white color. no body, faa lights, noise, wings, windows, markings or typical commerical or helicopter type of aerodynamic movement.

then this object seemed to disappear into thin air. a few minutes went by and i noticed what looked like a black orb coming out of a strange cloud formation that just appeared out of nowhere in the west. i kept watching and thought maybe it was a helicopter but i did not see the usual lights or hear any noise. this was not a bird. this object sat low and then moved. it had no wings or bird like movements. then another commerical airplane came in and this black orb object moved from this cloud formation and flew around this plane coming in. this object looked like it was dancing with the plane and the movements were slow and fluid. this object then went back down to where the cloud was and just vanished as did the cloud formation. 

a couple of minutes went by and i noticed what i thought was a bright planet or a star. it was probably 100/200 feet from the neighbors roof heading due east. i thought maybe a plane but they usaully dont fly that low over the homes. i wathced as this sometimes white to pink light neared. but it stopped and then vanished. then it appeared again only to get closer and bigger. this happened 2 more times and and it looked metal on the bottom with appendages. it was right over the roof top and just blinked out. i probably could touch it if i was on the roof. it was that low.
content.summary: Shiny oval, shield like object playing with midway airport planes coming in for landing

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were observing the night sky.  a bright light caught my periphial vision.  i turned to the north, and observed a star like object travelling faster than a jet or satalite in an easterly direction, and made no sound.  it shone brighter than jupiter, which planet we were primarly observing that evening.  as it was directly overhead, it began to shrink, making me think it was going up in a mighty hurry.  as it was shrinking, it turned red, finally disapearing in the night sky.
content.summary: Possible morphing object, or perspective opticle illusion?

content.detailedDescription: I couldnt have been more then 15 feet of the ground in my back yard i just woke up and there it was some weird yellowy white thing floating above my gazebo it wasnt very big.... but then it just took off straight up
content.summary: Blinding light

content.detailedDescription:
1. q. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
   a. i had just finished a bicycle security patrol of the site and had returned to my vehicle to write my observations and complete my report. at 2:26 a.M. i wrote how clear and calm it was outside. no wind what so ever. no humidity in the air or moisture on my vehicle. "earthquake weather"? i even think the insects and animals in the distance stopped making noises. it was too quiet.

2. q. what made you first notice the object?
   a. i had just entered my observations into the site log. ending comments in the log noted something to the effect that the night sky was extremely clear and calm. i exited my vehicle and looked to the south, the direction the vehicle was facing to observe the site below. i was parked on a dark hilltop away from the city lights and within sight of the rotating beacon at our local airport (french valley airport - faa designation f70) located approximately 2 miles to the southeast. from the hilltop, i look down (and south) onto a lighted parking lot on the site i patrol. the lower surface of the craft became visible as it approached the parking lot from the south. the parking lot lights were being reflected off of the lower surface of the craft which means the craft was low enough to be able to reflect the light off it's lower surface. the craft was not shinny or metallic in nature. 

my first thought (as a hang glider pilot) was why is there a hang glider flying in the darkness (no moonlight)?  a hang glider would not be able to maintain altitude in the current weather conditions.

3. q. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
   a. i am a hang glider pilot, ex-military pilot and faa licensed private pilot for over 27 years. i am familiar with all declassified types of military and civilian aircraft. at first, i thought it was a hang glider. but, i thought to myself, what would a hang glider be doing out here flying on a 'moonless' night? the craft was maintaining it's altitude. a hang glider would be descending. it was not a hang glider. i was amazed at how it silently passed overhead without the aid of wings as we know them.
i thought the craft appeared to be too large for a so called drone.

4. q. describe the object and its actions and motions.
   a. i observed the craft as it traveled through a viewing arc of approximately 60 degrees. the time to pass through this arc was approximately 10 seconds. i estimated the speed at about 80 to 100 miles per hour. there were no exterior anti collision lights or strobes. there were no markings on the lower surface of the craft except for the unique camouflage pattern.
the object was a triangle shape as viewed from the bottom side only. 
it had an aspect ratio of approximately 3:4. wing span 3 : fuselage 4. i did not see a side view profile. as the craft flew directly overhead, i reached through the open window into my vehicle for my fully charged 'mag light' flashlight, laying on the drivers seat, which was previously adjusted to deliver a tight beam of light and illuminate an object to approximately 300 feet.  i did not take my eyes off of the craft as i reached for the light. i aimed the mag light at the passing craft hoping to see anymore detail, with no effect. therefore the craft was slightly higher than 300 feet. i would estimate 400 or 500 ft agl. i measured the width (wing span) of the craft by spacing my right thumb and forefinger apart accordingly. then, i turned south to the parking lot below and held my fingers at the same 'arms length' against a section of fence lining the parking lot. i proceeded to that section of fence and paced it off. i calculated 42 to 45 feet.

at a ratio of 3:4. a 45 foot width translates into a 60 foot length.
my flashlight can typically illuminate an object at approximately 300 feet under those same atmospheric conditions. however, the craft was just out of range of my beam of light as it passed overhead. and below the standard traffic pattern (approximately 700 ft (agl) for the nearby french valley airport.

the craft was silently (no humming, electrical or pulsing noise) traveling from south to north (on the grid ). again, it was dead quiet outside.Not magnetic north. as it passed by, i located polaris, the north star and the craft was heading directly toward it. my flashlight beam did not affect the craft and there was no reaction from it. i recently learned that a birds flight path can be affected or altered if you shine a high beam light at or in front of the bird in flight. i know this from first hand experience.

there was an odd camouflage pattern on the lower surface of the craft as it passed overhead. i asked myself why the bottom of the craft would need to be pattered in such a way? 
  
5. q. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
   a. i couldn't believe what i was seeing. i removed my prescription  glasses and rapidly rubbed each eye while keeping one eye on the object at all times. i only wish a had a witness to verify what i was seeing. i was 'wowed' but not overwhelmed. however, i am a scientific realist and cannot believe that this object originated on another planet. this technology could be the result of a "black government project" the crafts clean, simple and concise lines were easily seen. there was nothing left to the imagination. i felt afterword that if this was extraterrestrial in nature, i would have expected a more aerodynamic looking craft designed with more compound curves. again, i felt this was military and not extraterrestrial. however,i felt the technology would be extraterrestrial in nature.

6. q. how did you lose sight of the object?
   a. the craft and faded out of sight into the darkness when the lower surface was no longer illuminated from the ambient light provided by the parking lot lights below.
content.summary: A triangle shaped craft passed silently almost directly overhead at an altitude of 300-500 ft  agl.

content.detailedDescription:
I was delivering pizza at the time, driving north on hogan toward wood village, and was approaching glisan/cherry park rd. to the north-northwest i spotted a dark object just above the houses and trees. i don't recall how it caught my attention at first. usually my eyes are rather focused on the road while on deliveries.
my first thought was that it was a large bird hovering over prey, so i continued to watch. it then tilted slightly, glimmering and reflecting light as though made of chrome or silver. this isn't far from an airport, so i thought perhaps this was an airplane or helicopter, however i'd never seen one this shape nor one reflect light the way this appeared to. and they're usually moving at a brisk pace. this didn't appear to be moving so much as quivering and slowly rising, and was not growing larger as a plane would if approaching. my next thought was that someone lost a large, reflective helium balloon or was flying a remote-controlled toy aircraft. but the shape was odd, like a sideways fedora. at this point, i felt as though i was reaching for explanations for what i was seeing, and had a difficult time believing this could be an alien craft as it was mid-afternoon over a very public area. i continued to watch as best i could without risking an auto accident. by the time it occurred to me to grab my cell phone and attempt to snap a shot or video of it, it had begun moving (much more quickly than the aircraft i typically see in the air around here) to the southwest and was out of sight by the time i had approached the down slope north of cherry park rd and could no longer track it. even had i thought sooner to take a shot, i doubt it would've shown up on my low-quality cell cam. the entire event couldn't have lasted more than 20-30 minutes.
content.summary: A small metallic object hovered over eastern portland, then flew away

content.detailedDescription:
Over the past two weeks i"ve seen several bright star-like objects here in colorado, in places they shouldn't be, and have even reported them with mufon.  just tonite i got video (vhs sorry), but also got pics of an insanely bright light that hovered just at dusk and just as it got dark, about 30 minutes. it was brighter than venus and at least appeared to be two to three times larger than it and any other star, not to mention that a star or planet wouldn't be at this spot in the sky, especially in the western sky, low, at 7pm. i've attached a picture that i uploaded, cropped and "auto fixed" in ms office picture manager  so you could see the brightness. the picture was taken at 10x optical zoom.

in the picture, there appears to be a perfectly shaped star light above it, that wasn't visible with the naked eye, though in the binoculars, it appeared to "spit" colors off of itself, which i guess is what is at the top corner. 

it looked like an orb in the sky, and pulsed, not flashed, but pulsed like a heartbeat. as you'll see, my hand wasn't perfectly steady at the moment it pulsed, so it looks longer in the picture than it did in the sky.

it stayed in that spot for almost 20 - 30 minutes and then was completely gone and away from that spot, heading west into the mountains, in less than a minute or two. there's no way it was a plane. i've never seen anything like it, so close and bright, just after sunset especially.
content.summary: Picture of extremely bright fireball type of light in western sky at dusk and just after

content.detailedDescription: 5 star-like objects moving at fast speeds traveling south from the constellation orion. all appeared 5 minutes apart
content.summary: 5 star-like objects moving at fast speeds traveling south from the constellation orion

content.detailedDescription:
This morning was very overcast, 100% cloud cover,  not "fluffy" cloud, very uniform. i am working on a new building which is at the 5th floor level, to set up work for tomorrow i was checking the location of a surveyors axis line, actually sighting along the line, i was looking due east towards long island, when i noticed what appeared to be a kite floating in the sky, what interested me was there was  no wind this morning... nothing.. still, la guardia airport is roughly north east of the site, a twin engined passenger flew diagionly by at about that time, that the first clue i had as to the scale of the object i was observing, now i am curious, the object was approx 2/3 the wing span of the jet. the was some beetween a 1/2 mile to a mile distant, the object appeared to be well past the jet, due to the greyness of the whole sky it was very diffuclt to make any kind of estimate of distances, but i have watched aircraft on that flight path recently  and judjed by that. some thing else about object was that it opaque, and faded completly, from time to time into the backround, my first thoughts wre this might be some kind of military secret aircraft on a test run or something, being between two international airports it would be "discovered" thereby proving or disproving the object capability of stealth or something, this whole thing went on for 15 to 20 minutes, also it changed shape from parashute shape to plaice (the flat fish) to disk depending on the objects movement,
i drew some sketches shortly afterwards, send a fax # i will forward the page. to say the least i was stunned and also the object moved east/west and up and with real smooth movement. one other thing a helocopter flew from south of the objects location, it looked (heilo) minute in relation to the object at first, the was helocopter flew in my direction it too 2 to 2 1/2 minutes for it to pass me, i dont know how fast helocopters fly' again cant estimate distant, and the object was behind the helo.
i have no clue what i observed, this is not a figment of my imagination.
i dont have a scanner but i do have a sketch with notes
content.summary: Disk like objects over brooklyn at 9am

content.detailedDescription: my girlfriend and i had spent the day in flagstaff on the 28th of september 2008.  our last stop was barnes and noble, which took us about three hours.  we left barnes and noble at about 9:15pm with loads new books and cds.  my girlfriend unwrapped her new libera boy's choir cd and we started listening to that.  we headed towards sedona on i-17 and then made our exit onto 89a south as we usually do.  we passed jackson's grill on our right and continued for maybe 1-2 miles before first seeing the ufo.  we saw a steady yellow orange light in the distance, south of us.  my girlfriend pointed the light out. weweresurprisedtoseethislargelightunlike anything we had ever seen in the night sky.  we could see the light getting closer and closer.  the craft moved to the left, east and disappeared for a second behind the dense pine forest.  a moment later it reemerged and at that point it was about 3,000 feet away from us, it was floating right above the pine trees to the left of the highway ahead.                                                                          we didn't stop the car at any time, we kept moving.  we moved closer to the craft until we were about 700 feet away from it.  we could see that it was peanut shaped with a large, yellow, rectangular window in the center.  either the window was tinted yellow or the interior was yellow in color.  we didn't see any beings inside.  there were lights all over the craft but there was no order to their placement, very random.  there was a large red light and a large green light and lots of little cream-yellow and blue lights all over the craft.  the craft was about the size of a one story large house.  there was no noise, no dirt was stirred, the tree tops didn't sway at all.  alexandra was holding my hand tight and somehow seeminly calm.  i was quite scared because there was absolutely no doubt or question as to what i was seeing a short distance from the car.  that realization gave me an instant cold sweat and an instant desire to leave a quickly as possible.  with shouts of curses i urged alexandra to accelerate.  i was even too frightened to look over my shoulder towards the rear of the car, but i did just in time to see a flash of light through the trees followed by a flood light of some kind.  the light was shining directly at us, that urged my fear on even more.  i looked foward and did not look back.  seconds later we passed a car heading north, our instinct was to stop them but honestly too afraid to do so.  this car would have seen the light. there was no other car on the road that would have seen the craft but the two of us.  there were two ufos in the sky that night, one we saw up close, the other stayed in the sky the whole time fixed in one spot.  at a distance this second craft looked just like the first one we saw, an orange-yellow large light.  we didn't experience any missing time that we know of.  we sketched the craft as soon as we got home.
content.summary: Roadside sighting of craft about 5 minutes south of flagstaff.

content.detailedDescription:
A glowing orb, a witches howl, 101st airborne soldiers


up front i must say that i was not a witness to the event i am about to share. i am however the father and father-in-law of two of the witnesses, as well as knowing the other witnesses. it is also important at this time for me to state that i have the utmost respect and admiration for all of the witnesses involved, and believe every word that they shared with me of their experience.
half of the guests arriving that summer night in 2005 (year date correction 2006)with their wives and girlfriends for a cookout only wanted to enjoy the evening with good friends and relax. they were war weary, veteran soldiers of the 101st airborne out of ft. campbell, ky, having returned stateside a few weeks earlier from a tour of duty in iraqi and soon to be redeployed again in 2006. their hosts for the evening were my daughter, theresa, and her fianc��� and soon to be husband bryan, also a veteran of the iraqi war and still in active reserve. nobody had a clue when the cookout began that a few hours later they would have a strange experience that would create an air of apprehension and leave them scratching their heads in wonder and amazement. 
the cookout itself was no different than any other cookout that these guests have attended throughout the years. hotdogs and hamburgers were being grilled and devoured; fruit bowls salads and desserts being prepared and served, and an occasional well deserved beer being consumed. the only difference between this cookout and others were the stories being shared. these were stories of brave men, all who volunteered after 9/11, willing to risk their lives in the defense of their country, of gallantry in battle and fighting an enemy whose bravery consisted only of murdering innocent men, women and children with car bombs and by other means. in the past i have asked these men to share some of these stories with me and at times have met resistance���resistance in the sense that they wish not to be thought of as heroes, but only doing a job that they believed in. as i shared earlier, one of these men was my son-in-law. as a sometimes overly protective father of his only daughter, i could not be any more proud of her choice in a husband with whom to create a lifetime of precious memories.
as the evening progressed, most of the group decided to sit cross legged in a circle on the driveway at the back of the house. the conversation was flowing freely and unabated until it was interrupted by a scream that seemed to emanate from the air itself and every place at once. chill bumps suddenly and unexpectedly took the place of the warm night air caressing their skin. at this exact same time someone yelled that there was a glowing, white orb the size of a basketball emerging from a seven foot tall line of bushes that ran down the left side of the driveway not more than 20 feet away. one young lady then sprang to her feet and declared with some conviction that the scream was that of a ���witch,��� and then ran into the house to tell those few who were not outside sitting on the driveway. by this time everyone in the circle was standing. bryan and two other men ran into the basement a few feet away and returned a few seconds later with weapons���a blow torch and two large automotive wrenches. by this time the orb had slowly floated through the air about 5 feet off the deck into the back yard some 40 feet from where it had first been seen. not knowing if the glowing orb was a friendly, bryan and the two men began to converge on the orb using military tactics���one left, one right, and one in the middle. the orb seemed to sense the presence of the three and began to veer left into the neighbor���s yard. whether using intelligence or instincts, it slowly maneuvered through an array of trees and seemed to be using the trees as a buffer to separate itself from the three. a few moments later the orb stopped. the three continued their advance on the glowing orb until they were about ten feet away from it when it suddenly vanished right before their eyes. the ���witches scream��� ceased at this time as well; its blood curdling cry no more.
needless to say everyone became a bit apprehensive during and after the experience. the emotional impact on one soldier was more telling than with the others. he vanquished himself to the house and upon leaving stated loudly, ���i didn���t sign up for this!��� on the surface this might seem a little strange for soldiers to feel any kind of fear after having fought a vicious enemy in a war and having to soon face him again in the future, but not really. in my extensive, hands on research of the paranormal, i have periodically been involved in cases where the bravest and strongest of people fall prey to the fear of a ghost, a bigfoot, ufos, aliens (et���s), etc. i believe that this fear is based on the belief system of each individual. the majority of the population���s belief system is based on what supposedly learned men of science and religion tell us as what is real and not real. not many people dispute religious leaders when they tell us that we must fear god and the devil, and that aliens are demons, and that by messing around with any aspects of the paranormal it will surely carry us to the gates of hell. on the other hand, scientist���s state emphatically that anything in the paranormal realm is not real; that those who claim  to see or have contact with such things are either lying, delusional or they are just plain mistaken about what they experienced���as in misidentifying a star, the moon, a plane as a ufo.
the brave soldiers at the cookout had been trained to fight a physical and tangible enemy who cannot suddenly materialize and disappear into thin air as if on a whim. what the group experienced that night falls into the category of the paranormal���something unknown was real and tangible and did materialize and disappeared on a whim.
from my own personal paranormal experiences, i strongly believe that most people who share paranormal type experiences are not lying or delusional; that they actually have paranormal experiences that are real; that though what they experienced cannot be seen, touched and studied in our three dimensional world, it is still real nevertheless.
a good example of my belief is fortified in a survey poll conducted for an article that life magazine ran as their cover story in the march 2000 issue, an article about ufo, aliens and abductions. i was interviewed and my personal abduction experiences were one of the main features of the article. though the writer did a hatchet job on the whole subject matter, including me, the poll tells a different story as compared to the writer���s beliefs and so called unbiased writing style. 
one of the questions was this: ���have you or anyone else you know ever seen a ufo, or haven���t you?��� though 79% answered ���no��� to this question, 2% answered ���not sure,��� while 6% answered ���yes, personally��� and 13% answered ���yes, someone i know.��� now if you take the 19% who answered ���yes��� and divide this with the estimated population of just the united states in 2000, you get the rounded off figure of 53 million individuals. 
now according to what scientist���s state and believe, this would mean that almost 20% of the unites states population is either liars, mentally ill or can���t tell the difference between a stationary star, or a big, white moon, or a fast moving plane and an unknown object that looks like none of the above...
i don���t think so!

sandy nichols
www.Alienresearchgroup.Com
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A glowing orb,  a witches howl

content.detailedDescription:
We were getting ready for bed at 2;30 am and we had this feeling like there was static in the air .The animals next door and the houses behind us (chickens , dogs,horses) started making a commotion then went silent.  so i walked to the bathroom and looked out the window to see what was going on and saw a large white light in the sky on the  northwest side of our house and thought it was an airplane. there was no sound, flying slowly . i then called my wife to come see the object . we watched it fly  northeast . then it made a sharp turn to the north and did not change intensity . it was a perfect circle of light no matter the direction of travel .
     it then turned back to the northeast after flying only a short distance , it went out of sight over the house . the skies were clear and no moon , we think that it was 1500-2000 feet elevation .  
        this frightened us so much that we just went to bed and never told the event to anyone and did'nt want to be ridiculed by non believers .But the wife and i thought that we needed to tell someone . this happened in the spring of this year '08 . dont remember the exact day as we kept it to ourselves so long . the funny part is we have a video camera and a digital camera sitting in the closet on the other side of the bedroom, just caught up in the moment i guess ?. ha  ha  !!!
content.summary: Slow moving ball of light

content.detailedDescription: I was working on some art projects when colors of red-green-blue flashes caught my attention outside of the window directly across from me. the blinds were down. at the very top of the blinds where a space is between the slat and the sill (top crack of blind's slats) is where it was flashing. so i looked out and didn't see anything so i grabbed my camera and went outside onto the back balcony deck overlooking the naval shipyard. the clouds were anomalous and so i started shooting. two bright white orbs appeared and kept their distance from each other and came to a stop right above me. then took off to the left side of the skies above. two more orbs appeared and came from same area the first two orbs seemed to have come from. this picture is taken around the left side of the skies where the objects took off into. this was not a digital glitch in my 10 meg kodak digital camera. then when you zoom into this object- the pixelation is not the usual in digital photography. instead it appears like a circuit board design! what do you all think? this was invisible to the naked eye.
content.summary: Invisible to naked eye. flashes of color outside window caught my attention.

content.detailedDescription:
It was afternoon, the sky was quite clear, not too much cloud.

i was sitting in a moving sedan next to my friend who was driving. the car was moving about 30mile/hr , quite stable velocity, minimum acceleration in the great highway, next to the pacific ocean.

as the car moving to the south, looking to the right side of the window, there were two cigar-shaped object flying side by side in a calmly fashion as long as my observation lasted about 5 minutes. the distance of them from our moving car was quite far, but was clear enough. i was staring at them until they are out of sight from the passanger seat window next to the driver seat.
content.summary: Twin cigar-shaped hovering side-to-side

content.detailedDescription: Very strange star like orb was spotted tonight and dissipated in mid air when i went off my porch to see where it was heading i thought at first it was a plain but i noticed when it got a little closer it looked to be in my own words a star like orb and it was hovering very weird i went to get my mother to come and look at what i was seeing and when i ran back off the porch it was gone i live in pa, and this is not my first sighting before seeing that what i call a orb looked to be flickering lights in the night sky sometimes out of the corner of my eyes and at times dead
content.summary: Seen star like object hovering from the north west to south east no blinking lights whats so ever

content.detailedDescription:
When i blew up picture you can see the distinct outline of the object.  there was no plane or helicopted in the sky. thought it could be a bug but as you can see in the picture kansas just experienced an ice storm so to cold for bugs to exist.

previous experience: in may 1996 my wife and i had a very intimate experience with a ufo that was about 200 ft from the ground - very low.  we were traveling from gt. bend, ks to larnerd on main highway at around 9:30 pm.  an object the shape of blimp or cigar slowly flew directly over the highway. the object was silent and had lights underneith the object. 

all the cars on the road stopped and wathced the object as it flew overhead. i made a u-turn on the road facing back towards the highway. the object slowley flew 2-miles down radium rd and stopped.  my wife was really scared and wanted to go home.

i headed about 2-3 miles back to town then decided to make another u-turn and had back towards larnerd. what ever the object was darted out about 2-3 miles ahead of us and hovered parallel to the highway.  i was jolted by this experience and we made another u-turn and headed back home. 

the object followed us for about 5 minutes then disappeared.  i am not sure exactly what the object was but was definitely not normal.  my family and friends have for years witnessed sitings in the area.
content.summary: As i was driving, i was taking pictures of landscape outside my vehicle window. when viewing digital image on pc i noticed small object in the upper center of pictuer. blow up the picture to see the outline better. what is this?

content.detailedDescription:
Fairless hills is full this evening. (the time i began seeing all these objects was around 8:30pm)there are bright, quick flickering lights hovering & disappearing in the sky.  there are also several quiet helicopters circling the area.  there were only 2 helicopters, now there are several, two of which i noticed flying in formation with each other as though they were combing the area.
 
when i was taking out the trash i noticed one very quick flickering light hovering over, i think, the fairless hills golf course, quite high up in the sky. then i saw another quick flickering object hovering around trenton rd & woodbourne rd. after this one quickly disappeared another one flickered on down around oxford valley rd & new falls rd. they all hovered & flickered on again for about five mins or so. i know it to be about that amount of time because i had to run into the house to get my car keys so i could get the camera.  i apologize that i did not get any pictures as i couldn't figure out how to get the digital to work at night.  i'll get someone to show me so i'll be ready for the next time.
 
i came outside after getting the kids down to bed & saw a number of helicopters circling the area.  i noticed another hovering, quick flickering object over the oxford valley mall area, & then another one flickered on & off further south, but in the same vicinity. my daughter came outside to check on me (she's 4, so she's not a good witness), but that's when i saw the helicopters flying in formation & circling the mall area.

responsibilities took over & i had to go into the house, but the helicopters & flickering objects were still going on when i came in at 9:45pm.
content.summary: Hovering, quick flickering objects in fairless hills area.

content.detailedDescription:
We were having a movie night with some friends and i went out on the deck 
(we reside close to the blue ridge mountains) to smoke a cigarette.As i was looking up to the sky towards the west,i noticed a sphere-like object
hovering above in the distance it was lit up and composed of various colors moving slowly towards the west. i proceeded to gather my friends and family to witness the event.
   they were baffeled by the sight of this also.We were amazed by the sighting,however we had previously seen another object approx. one year ago,but that one was of a different shape(large triangular shape)so we were not totally shocked,but our friends were shocked because they were non-believers until this incident enlighted them.
  we lost sight of the object as it continued to slowly head towards the west.
content.summary: We witnessed  a spere-like object

content.detailedDescription:
I awoken about 1:00 am last night and i saw a figure
of a person that looked like stanton friedman the ufo
resercher and i asked him stanton where did the cia
get all of that nuclear tecknology. and the figure
disapered and i heared a voice say in the darkness
i cant use you in a really discused manner and it
walked away into the darkness. and i kept wakeing up
and falling back to sleep because what ever it was
it had disterbed my sleep patern. as far as the question
i had asked not too shure why i asked that question
seemed like it just came out.

i dont know what to think of that one but who ever it was
i hope to god it does not come back at all. it may have
been a nephilium i see those sometimes.
content.summary: Encounter

content.detailedDescription:
I took these two photos 4 seconds apart. the first photo shows many ufo's then the next photo 4 seconds later they all vanished.

http://webcamfo.Com
content.summary: Two photos 4 seconds apart show many ufo's

content.detailedDescription:
While working at a grocery store bagging groceries i walked a customer out to her car to place her groceries in her car for her. we were walking east in the parking lot. it was afternoon and the sun was behind us. we both saw the object at the same time. we stopped walking and stared. the object was approximately two hundred yards away. it was stationary above large power lines (transmission lines). it was almost touching them. 
now i will try to describe it. it was rectangular in shape. using objects near the craft such as cars and buildings i was able to get an approximate size. it was 40 to 50 feet in length and 10 feet in width. the color is really difficult to describe. it was bronze, bright shiny bronze. 
this is the best way i can describe what happended next, it appeared that the bronze color was folding in on itself towards the middle. as it was doing this either the object moved directly away from us or collapsed in on itself. it disappeared very quickly. the whole sighting took place in about 10 seconds. 
when it was gone the customer said "did you see that?". i replied yes. we said nothing else about it.

i know 1971 was a long time ago but i remember it clearly like it was yesterday. i still wonder what it was and still look for it when i pass that location today.
content.summary: Observed rectangular ufo over (almost touching) power lines. watched it leave or disappear.

content.detailedDescription:
First, my neighbor had been down at the beach which is just a few blocks from us.  he saw the lights but didn't hear any sound and found it very unusal and noticed a gentlemen further down the beach just staring.  he asked him if he saw the lights and the guy was relieved that my neighbor drew had witnessed the same thing.  he came back to his house and then asked me to come over and we sat in the yard looking at the sky.  it was a couple hours later that it happened.  first on orange glowing light that went off but another one came on.  there was a total of 4 lights.  there was no sound, it was a quiet evening.  no other lights, nothing!  he went in and ended up calling the coast guard and asked them if they were running any tests or anything and was told no.  well it wasn't very long after that an article appeared in our sun news paper dated novemeber 4,2005 written by issac j bailey a different perspective with the the title "here goes another confession"  
now i haven't a clue what it was that i saw, i just know, it wasn't flares as it was too perfect going across light to light, it wasn't a plane, there was no sound.  again, i don't know what i saw as it went as quickly as i had  appeared.
content.summary: 4 bright orange lights in a row but not all at once over the atlantic
